params.sqlcmd: "select " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" as \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"DRAW_CD\\" as \\"DRAW_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"SPEC\\" as \\"SPEC\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_SPOIL\\", 'FM99990.0999') as \\"ITEM_SPOIL\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"MAX_PERIOD\\", 'FM999990') as \\"MAX_PERIOD\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"MUL_ODR_QTY\\", 'FM99999999999990.0999') as \\"MUL_ODR_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"MAX_ODR_QTY\\", 'FM99999999999990.0999') as \\"MAX_ODR_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"MIN_ODR_QTY\\", 'FM99999999999990.0999') as \\"MIN_ODR_QTY\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\" as \\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\" as \\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\" as \\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"LOT_SIZING_TYP\\" as \\"LOT_SIZING_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ODR_LT\\" as \\"ODR_LT\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"FIXED_LT\\" as \\"FIXED_LT\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"PROP_LT\\" as \\"PROP_LT\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"SAFETY_LT\\" as \\"SAFETY_LT\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ISSUE_LT\\" as \\"ISSUE_LT\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ISSUE_TYP\\" as \\"ISSUE_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\" as \\"STOCK_UNIT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"PROP_LOT_SIZE\\", 'FM99999999999990.0999') as \\"PROP_LOT_SIZE\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"SAFETY_STOCK\\", 'FM99999999999990.0999') as \\"SAFETY_STOCK\\" " +"from " +" M_ITEM " +"where " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ?"

"insert into " +" T_OD(\\"OD_NO\\", \\"PLANT_CD\\", \\"ITEM_CD\\", \\"ODR_STS_TYP\\", \\"DM_STS_TYP\\", \\"OD_TYP\\", \\"DUE_DATE\\", \\"ODR_START_DATE\\", \\"PRD_DUE_DATE\\", \\"PRD_START_DATE\\", \\"DM_QTY\\", \\"ODR_QTY\\", \\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\", \\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\", \\"ISSUE_TYP\\", \\"ODR_LT\\", \\"FIXED_LT\\", \\"PROP_LT\\", \\"SAFETY_LT\\", \\"ISSUE_LT\\", \\"PROP_LOT_SIZE\\", \\"OD_GNR_TYP\\", \\"OD_LEVEL_NO\\", \\"ITEM_SPOIL\\", \\"CONS_TYP\\", \\"MRP_TYP\\", \\"EXTERNAL_DM_FLG\\") " +"values " +" (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, TO_DATE(?,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24MI'), TO_DATE(?,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24MI'), TO_DATE(?,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24MI'), TO_DATE(?,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24MI'), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), 1, 1, ?, 0, ?, ?)"

"select " +" T_OD.\\"OD_NO\\" as \\"OD_NO\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_OD.\\"PRD_DUE_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') as \\"PRD_DUE_DATE\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_OD.\\"DM_QTY\\", 'FM99999999999990.0999') as \\"DM_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_OD.\\"ODR_QTY\\", 'FM99999999999990.0999') as \\"ODR_QTY\\", " +" T_OD.\\"OD_TYP\\" as \\"OD_TYP\\", " +" T_OD.\\"ODR_STS_TYP\\" as ODR_STS_TYP, " +" T_OD.\\"DM_STS_TYP\\" as DM_STS_TYP, " +" T_OD.\\"MRP_TYP\\" as \\"MRP_TYP\\", " +" T_OD.\\"EXTERNAL_DM_FLG\\" as \\"EXTERNAL_DM_FLG\\", " +" T_OD.\\"ODR_RELEASE_FLG\\" as \\"ODR_RELEASE_FLG\\", " +" T_OD.\\"PARENT_OD_NO\\" as \\"PARENT_OD_NO\\", " +" T_OD.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"OD_MODIFY_COUNT\\", " +" T_EXTERNAL_PLAN.\\"EXTERNAL_PLAN_CD\\" as \\"EXTERNAL_PLAN_CD\\", " +" T_EXTERNAL_PLAN.\\"EXTERNAL_PLAN_EXP_TYP\\" as \\"EXTERNAL_PLAN_EXP_TYP\\", " +" T_EXTERNAL_PLAN.\\"EXTERNAL_PLAN_DEL_FLG\\" as \\"EXTERNAL_PLAN_DEL_FLG\\", " +" T_EXTERNAL_PLAN.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"EXT_MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" T_OD, " +" T_EXTERNAL_PLAN " +"where " +" T_EXTERNAL_PLAN.\\"EXTERNAL_PLAN_REG_TYP\\" = 1 " +" and T_OD.\\"OD_NO\\" = T_EXTERNAL_PLAN.\\"OD_NO\\" " +" and T_OD.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_OD.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_OD.\\"ODR_STS_TYP\\" = ? " +" and T_OD.\\"DM_STS_TYP\\" = ? " +" and T_OD.\\"OD_TYP\\" = ? " +" and T_OD.\\"PRD_DUE_DATE\\" >= ? " +" and T_OD.\\"PRD_DUE_DATE\\" <= ? " +"order by " +" T_OD.\\"PRD_DUE_DATE\\" ASC, " +" T_OD.\\"OD_NO\\" ASC"

"update " +" T_OD " +"set " +" T_OD.\\"ODR_START_DATE\\" = TO_DATE(?,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24MI'), " +" T_OD.\\"PRD_START_DATE\\" = TO_DATE(?,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24MI'), " +" T_OD.\\"DM_QTY\\" = ?, " +" T_OD.\\"ODR_QTY\\" = ?, " +" T_OD.\\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\" = ?, " +" T_OD.\\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\" = ?, " +" T_OD.\\"ISSUE_TYP\\" = ?, " +" T_OD.\\"ODR_LT\\" = ?, " +" T_OD.\\"FIXED_LT\\" = ?, " +" T_OD.\\"PROP_LT\\" = ?, " +" T_OD.\\"SAFETY_LT\\" = ?, " +" T_OD.\\"ISSUE_LT\\" = ?, " +" T_OD.\\"PROP_LOT_SIZE\\" = ?, " +" T_OD.\\"ITEM_SPOIL\\" = ?, " +" T_OD.\\"MRP_TYP\\" = ?, " +" T_OD.\\"EXTERNAL_DM_FLG\\" = ? " +"where " +" T_OD.\\"OD_NO\\" = ?"

"select " +" MIN(M_CAL.\\"CAL_DATE\\") as \\"min_CAL_DATE\\", " +" MAX(M_CAL.\\"CAL_DATE\\") as \\"max_CAL_DATE\\" " +"from " +" M_CAL, " +" M_PLANT " +"where " +" M_CAL.\\"CAL_NO\\" = M_PLANT.\\"CAL_NO\\" " +" and M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" T_OD.\\"OD_NO\\" as \\"OD_NO\\", " +" T_OD.\\"DM_QTY\\" as \\"DM_QTY\\", " +" T_OD.\\"ODR_QTY\\" as \\"ODR_QTY\\", " +" T_OD.\\"OD_TYP\\" as \\"OD_TYP\\", " +" T_OD.\\"ODR_STS_TYP\\" as ODR_STS_TYP, " +" T_OD.\\"DM_STS_TYP\\" as DM_STS_TYP, " +" T_OD.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"OD_MODIFY_COUNT\\", " +" T_OD.\\"EXTERNAL_DM_FLG\\" as \\"EXTERNAL_DM_FLG\\", " +" T_EXTERNAL_PLAN.\\"EXTERNAL_PLAN_EXP_TYP\\" as \\"EXTERNAL_PLAN_EXP_TYP\\", " +" T_EXTERNAL_PLAN.\\"EXTERNAL_PLAN_DEL_FLG\\" as \\"EXTERNAL_PLAN_DEL_FLG\\", " +" T_EXTERNAL_PLAN.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"EXT_MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" T_OD, " +" T_EXTERNAL_PLAN " +"where " +" T_OD.\\"OD_NO\\" = ? " +" and T_EXTERNAL_PLAN.\\"EXTERNAL_PLAN_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_OD.\\"OD_NO\\" = T_EXTERNAL_PLAN.\\"OD_NO\\" " +"for update nowait"

"SELECT " +" MIN(M_CAL.\\"CAL_DATE\\") AS \\"min_CAL_DATE\\", " +" MAX(M_CAL.\\"CAL_DATE\\") AS \\"max_CAL_DATE\\" " +"FROM " +" M_CAL, " +" M_ITEM " +"WHERE " +" M_CAL.\\"CAL_NO\\" = M_ITEM.\\"CAL_NO\\" " +" AND M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ?"

cell.name: MRP_ODR_NAME
cell.description: 品目手配区分の表示文字列

cell.name: OUTSIDE_NAME
cell.description: 品目内外作区分の表示文字列

cell.name: UNIT_QTY_NAME
cell.description: 在庫数量単位区分の表示文字列

cell.name: LOT_SIZING_NAME
cell.description: ロットまとめ区分の表示文字列

cell.name: dispDM_QTY
cell.description: 表示用 外部デマンド数

cell.name: dispODR_QTY
cell.description: 表示用 外部オーダ数

cell.name: IsReleased
cell.description: 同一外部計画番号で登録済みオーダのうち オーダ発効済があるかどうか

cell.name: PROP_LOT_SIZE
cell.description: 品目比例分ロットサイズ

cell.name: LOT_SIZING_TYP
cell.description: 品目.ロットまとめ区分

cell.name: ODR_RELEASE_FLG
cell.description: 所要量.オーダ発効済フラグ

cell.name: MRP_TYP
cell.description: 所要量.所要量処理区分

cell.name: PARENT_OD_NO
cell.description: 親オーダデマンド番号
